changeSet.author: Shabakhov_Eset
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.user( id bigserial primary key, role role_type NOT NULL, email varchar NOT NULL UNIQUE, username varchar NOT NULL UNIQUE, display_name varchar NOT NULL, password varchar NOT NULL, is_active boolean NOT NULL );

changeSet.author: Shabakhov_Eset
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.organizer( id bigserial primary key, name varchar, description varchar, industry varchar, address varchar, is_accredited boolean, CONSTRAINT fk_organizer_user FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES public.user(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: Shabakhov_Eset
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.member( id bigserial primary key, last_name varchar, first_name varchar, patronymic varchar, birth_date date, birth_city varchar, privacy privacy_type default 'ONLY_FRIENDS', CONSTRAINT fk_member_user FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES public.user(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: Shabakhov_Eset
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.moderator( id bigserial primary key, is_admin boolean, CONSTRAINT fk_moderator_user FOREIGN KEY (id) REFERENCES public.user(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: Timokhov_Evgeniy
Timokhov_Evgeniy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.event( id bigserial primary key, title varchar(50) NOT NULL, short_description varchar(100) NOT NULL, description text, format format_type NOT NULL, start_date_time timestamp NOT NULL, end_date_time timestamp NOT NULL, location varchar NOT NULL, latitude numeric, longitude numeric, pictures bytea, organizer_id bigserial NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_event_organizer FOREIGN KEY (organizer_id) REFERENCES public.organizer(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: Lebedev_Danil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.event_tags( event_id bigint NOT NULL, tag_id bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_event_id FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES public.event(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_tag_id FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES public.tag(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (event_id, tag_id) );

changeSet.author: Shabakhov_Eset
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.friend_request( sender_id bigint NOT NULL, recipient_id bigint NOT NULL, status friend_request_status_type NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_sender_member_id FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES public.member(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_sender_recipient_id FOREIGN KEY (recipient_id) REFERENCES public.member(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (sender_id, recipient_id) );

changeSet.author: Timokhov_Evgeniy
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE public.event_file( file_id bigserial not null primary key, file_name varchar not null, file_type varchar not null, file_size bigint not null, file_content bytea, event_id bigint not null, CONSTRAINT fk_event_file FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES public.event(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE
);

changeSet.author: Timokhov_Evgeniy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.event_members( event_id bigint NOT NULL, member_id bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_subscriber_member_id FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES public.member(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_subscriber_event_id FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES public.event(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (event_id, member_id) );

changeSet.author: Lebedev_Danil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE public.user_tags( user_id bigint NOT NULL, tag_id bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES public.user(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_tag_id FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES public.tag(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, tag_id) );

changeSet.author: Lebedev_Danil
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user_event_interactions ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id BIGINT, event_id BIGINT, interaction_type VARCHAR(50), created_at timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), CONSTRAINT valid_interaction_type CHECK (interaction_type IN ('VIEW', 'FAVORITE')), CONSTRAINT fk_user_interactions FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES public.user(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_event_interactions FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES public.event(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE ); CREATE INDEX idx_user_event_interactions_user_id ON user_event_interactions(user_id);
